meaning:
**Direction** of joystick input. Corresponds to the keys on a numpad.
(6 = forward, 3 = down-back, etc.).
**Cancel** the previous move to the following move.
**Chain/Target combo** the previous move into a followup.
**Link** the previous move to the following move (requires precise timing)
Do either X move **or** Y move.
Any **punch** or **kick** (when button strength does not matter)
**Anti-air**; hit the opponent while they're mid-air.

**Repeat** 'Y' input 'N' number of times.
A sequence of multiple inputs will be bundled into "{}".
